_3400256755.flavorText: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.

_1363886209.flavorText: “If there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?” — Feizel Crux

_2179048386.flavorText: A new chapter for an old legend.

_548958835.flavorText: An early prototype that brought the potential for future Trace Rifles into sharper focus.

_2708806099.flavorText: A treasured competition piece from a bygone era.

_1679868061.flavorText: A trusty companion for those long walks in hard vacuum.

_3849810018.flavorText: When the dead speak, you should listen.

_3257091167.flavorText: If only there was a way to combine them…

_3257091166.flavorText: A fine blade, but seems like it's missing something…

_4164201232.flavorText: You can see everything. You can unsee nothing.

_235827225.flavorText: One day, young hawk, thou shalt sail beneath the silvered moon.

_2139640995.flavorText: After every age of darkness, an age of light.

_3743729616.flavorText: Nobody talks about the day the Shepherd's staff became the Shepherd's rifle.

_602618796.flavorText: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.

_6857689.flavorText: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."

_3409645497.flavorText: It's time to file a complaint.

_577528837.flavorText: "The Traveler is an illusion. A false god. It will not save us. But this might." —Arach Jalaal

_2261046232.flavorText: "'Monster' is a relative term. Just look at the Drifter."  —Glint

_2481758391.flavorText: "Persevere, or die in darkness. The choice is yours." —Emissary of the Nine

_3326850591.flavorText: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine

_2855157553.flavorText: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine

_1476654960.flavorText: "The greatest threat to a Guardian is another Guardian." —Emissary of the Nine

_725408022.flavorText: "When the time comes, make yours one to remember." —Petra Venj

_1866778462.flavorText: Think of it as a weaponized temper tantrum.

_2443900757.flavorText: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

_4255171531.flavorText: Think of it as a weaponized temper tantrum.

_1028582252.flavorText: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

_829330711.flavorText: "I will honor the terms of this armistice on one condition: the Iron Lords enforce it." —Lord Saladin

_1076810832.flavorText: "Say whatever you like. You'd just better be brave enough to say it to his face."  —Lady Efrideet

_3184681056.flavorText: "Imagine that as the last sound you hear." —Petra Venj

_1337707096.flavorText: "If you hear it, remove your helmet and face the closest Corsair. They will know what must be done." —Queen Mara

_3472875143.flavorText: "Keep the string a little loose. It's supposed to sound like that." —Petra Venj

_3044460004.flavorText: "The paths between stars are fractal mirrors of the neurons in our brains and the vicissitudes of our fates." —Sjari, Awoken Techeun

_2066434718.flavorText: "The stars roar with violent destruction. Channel their astral rage." —Ylaia, Awoken Techeun

_1622998472.flavorText: "Ammunition is the universal currency of the Sol system. The Cabal prefer to keep it that way." —Caiatl, Empress of the Cabal

_1833195496.flavorText: "One day, you will mold the world to your liking, dear brother, as I always have." —Queen Mara Sov

_3761898871.flavorText: "Weapon system no longer explodes when trigger is pulled." —Prototype 7.2.1 Revision Notes

_2782325302.flavorText: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin

_2782325301.flavorText: "A sword is a wand that casts two spells: parry and cut." —Tarsem Sauer

_2782325300.flavorText: My smile is full of blades.

_3556999246.flavorText: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2

_2272470786.flavorText: "However certain we are of our simulations, they always contain an element of unpredictability." —Lakshmi-2

_2414141462.flavorText: Glory in the damage the right blast can do.

_3165547384.flavorText: "I have no time for nostalgia. Give me visions of braided futures, brilliantly aflame." —Lakshmi-2

_2492081469.flavorText: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2

_4289226715.flavorText: …a causal loop within the weapon's mechanism, suggesting that the firing process somehow binds space and time into…

_603721696.flavorText: There are things colder than cold.

_4255586669.flavorText: "It's versatile. By itself, it's nothing, just an empty tube. But that's its deceptive beauty; it's all about what you fill it with. What you make it. What you make it do." —Banshee-44

_875848769.flavorText: "Give a little, but take a little more." —The Drifter

_310708513.flavorText: "A weapon hides nothing. It is what it is. Whether it wants to be or not." —Saint-14 to Shaxx

_681067419.flavorText: A Scout Rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

_852228780.flavorText: With the Uzume RR4 on your side, the Darkness doesn't stand a chance.

_4281371574.flavorText: A Scout Rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

_2065081837.flavorText: With the Uzume RR4 on your side, the Darkness doesn't stand a chance.

_4023807721.flavorText: "But here you are. This is truly a beginning…" —Shin Malphur

_3682803680.flavorText: "But here you are. This is truly a beginning…" —Shin Malphur

_1967303408.flavorText: "Earth weapons strong, but Eliksni make stronger. What your Zavalakel says: stronger, together?" —House Light Weaponsmith

_108221785.flavorText: "No. I will not allow a Fallen to fight in the Banner, that right is reserved for Guardians alone. But if you insist, I may allow a Guardian to carry a Fallen-forged weapon into battle. You are a weaponsmith, are you not?" —Lord Saladin to an Unknown Eliksni

_3813153080.flavorText: Do not say a little in many words—say a great deal in a few.

_852551895.flavorText: Silence is better than unmeaning words.

_1921159786.flavorText: The Hezen Axis Mind is tireless and infinite. Tireless and infinite. Tireless and infinite…

_3796510434.flavorText: A full measure annihilates the rules of reality.

_690668916.flavorText: In the abyss of time, all the lines converge… upon you.

_1216319404.flavorText: But where is your fate, and who brings it to you?

_4050645223.flavorText: The Hezen Axis Mind is tireless and infinite. While it cannot be stopped… it can be paused.

_471518543.flavorText: It breaks the rules of reality as ruthlessly as it shatters your foes.

_3653573172.flavorText: Praedyth's fall isn't over… because it hasn't happened yet… and it will happen again.

_3186018373.flavorText: What you have seen will mark you forever.

_2171478765.flavorText: Delivering the inevitable, one pull at a time.

_599895591.flavorText: Home is just over the horizon.

_541188001.flavorText: "A peace born from violence is no peace at all." —Lady Efrideet

_1621558458.flavorText: "No stars overhead. Best not to look up." —Amanda Holliday

_304659313.flavorText: "I can decode anything with a grenade launcher." —Saint-14

_3514096004.flavorText: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."

_1402766122.flavorText: They were so optimistic about us.

_2481881293.flavorText: Where does one end and the other begin?

_3335343363.flavorText: No one will escape my web.

_3654674561.flavorText: "Long, short, they all end the same way." —Katabasis

_409551876.flavorText: "I heard a Ghost die once, in Twilight Gap. Still hear it sometimes, on dark nights…"

_3717177717.flavorText: Friends are as companions on a journey who ought to aid each other to persevere.

_3593598010.flavorText: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.

_3836861464.flavorText: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

_2147010335.flavorText: A precision Auto Rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

_47772649.flavorText: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

_2633186522.flavorText: A precision Auto Rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

_2121785039.flavorText: "If looks could kill, you wouldn't even have to aim this thing." —Banshee-44

_3075224551.flavorText: "Most of our advanced tech was first used against us by alien races. Time to return the favor." —Lord Saladin

_1097616550.flavorText: "My warriors fight not for themselves, or even me, but for each other." —Empress Caiatl

_893527433.flavorText: "Distance is just a matter of timing." —Crow

_2496242052.flavorText: An unfinished inscription runs along the barrel: "Tlamus, she who—"

_3460122497.flavorText: Honor among foes. Glory to the vanquished.

_2060863616.flavorText: The only way out is through.

_3117873459.flavorText: Quality of construction and volume of destruction.

_1363238943.flavorText: From the many wings of ruin blows a wind that will reshape this dead world.

_1853180924.flavorText: "All we have left now is our faith."

_2357297366.flavorText: "Like a one-man private security company." —The Drifter

_3616586446.flavorText: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."

_3629968765.flavorText: See the art in what's subtracted.

_2742490609.flavorText: You will not see me coming.

_407621213.flavorText: Take your place among the company of heroes.

_65611680.flavorText: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.

_1690783811.flavorText: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

_1946491241.flavorText: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal

_614426548.flavorText: What won't be given must be taken.

_1216130969.flavorText: A familiar tool in the face of failure.

_211938782.flavorText: It sings of sorrows that have not yet come to pass.

_35794111.flavorText: A finger of death from which to hang.

_3143732432.flavorText: Gripped in the hands of the desperate many.

_3487253372.flavorText: The last thing the Vex ever heard—the grinding wails of a vicious Banshee.

_2603483885.flavorText: They return to moons devoid. Their eyes searching. It's just begun. Meet this storm of sound and fury, till thunder-clashes fade to silence.

_3460576091.flavorText: "The question becomes whether or not to fire, not where to aim." —Osiris

_2399110176.flavorText: "I want to see it all, unhindered, and know it's mine to take." —Clovis Bray

_370712896.flavorText: "I respect what I cannot steal from and you cannot take from the dark." —Excerpt from an old Eliksni salvage manifest

_3856705927.flavorText: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

_1594120904.flavorText: A single word etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: Now.

_1197486957.flavorText: "Don't let the Light blind you to what's right before your eyes."  —The Exo Stranger

_20935540.flavorText: "A haze permeates the air here, occluding clear sight. Be very sure of your aim." —The Exo Stranger

_4037745684.flavorText: "It seeps under your skin; settles in your bones. Even outside of its presence, you can feel its chill." —The Exo Stranger

_42351395.flavorText: "Our enemies are not subtle, so neither shall we be. Make the chasms echo with the thunder of your artillery." —Clovis Bray

_2870169846.flavorText: "Do not face your foes head-on. Barrage them from above. Bewilder them with misdirection." —Clovis Bray

_3514144928.flavorText: Join the dance of fire and birth.

_2386979999.flavorText: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

_532746994.flavorText: Even the brightest stars eventually set.

_1366917989.flavorText: Could you please repeat the question?

_3637570176.flavorText: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

_2891672170.flavorText: "Nice chitin. It'd be a shame if someone broke it." —Liu Feng

_2050789284.flavorText: Little is known about the early days of the Collapse. Signals vanished upon the arrival of the Darkness.

_3565520715.flavorText: Give them what they came for.

_2220884262.flavorText: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.

_1641430382.flavorText: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.

_4184808992.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Spider's eclectic tastes.

_2776503072.flavorText: "If anyone asks why you're out here, just reload." —Devrim Kay

_2453357042.flavorText: "Yes, you got the kill, but the pelt is ruined." —Devrim Kay

_4230965989.flavorText: A single word is etched inside the barrel: "Clovis-II-1."

_4248569242.flavorText: A single word etched inside the barrel: "Wilhelmina-1."

_3366545721.flavorText: A single word etched on the guard: "Lusia-1."

_2990047042.flavorText: A single word etched inside the barrel: "Sylvie-1."

_1392919471.flavorText: A single word is etched inside the barrel: "Alton-1."

_3281285075.flavorText: A single word is etched inside the barrel: "Anastasia-1."

_1513993763.flavorText: Speed, heat, and Light. Fire away.

_2714022207.flavorText: "We are only briefly Awoken. The rest of existence is an eternal dream." —Sedia

_981718087.flavorText: "The right message is loud at any volume." —Osiris

_1766088024.flavorText: "Europa has relit the fire in my soul; one that even its freezing winds cannot chill."  —Clovis Bray

_3512349612.flavorText: "A single idea can be enough to alter the spin of entire systems. I've had several of them." —Clovis Bray

_1621657423.flavorText: "The Fallen describe Darkness as a gale. A force of nature, arising suddenly, from seemingly nowhere." —The Exo Stranger

_2807687156.flavorText: "Who will speak for us when we are gone?" —Arach Jalaal

_1162247618.flavorText: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us make way for the new ruler!

_2257180473.flavorText: Come between your enemies and their lives.

_1786797708.flavorText: "The first step toward truth is to let go of all that we know and hold dear." —Arach Jalaal

_3055192515.flavorText: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2

_2857348871.flavorText: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo

_2742838700.flavorText: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2

_1723380073.flavorText: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2

_2742838701.flavorText: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal

_1665952087.flavorText: It's not a holdout weapon; it's a pathfinder.

_1179141605.flavorText: "I just like the name. Doesn't mean anything." —Lord Felwinter to Lord Timur

_1907698332.flavorText: Join the dance of fire and birth.

_2478792241.flavorText: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

_1697682876.flavorText: Even the brightest stars eventually set.

_958384347.flavorText: Could you please repeat the question?

_3164743584.flavorText: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

_766323545.flavorText: No offense is too small to reprimand.

_1821724780.flavorText: Word into law, held at gunpoint.

_3037520408.flavorText: A thing of elegance from a more civilized age.

_3937866388.flavorText: Kept in holster as the last line. Known for its reliability.

_2582755344.flavorText: Chained away long ago; its jaws too eager in times of peace.

_1561006927.flavorText: The old workhorse, still with many years to give.

_3824106094.flavorText: "Press on! The Devils will rue the day they came to our doors!" —Lord Shaxx

_4017959782.flavorText: "Duality is not a curse, but a gift." —Author unknown

_2415517654.flavorText: "The final stand is wherever I plant my feet. Not one step more." —Saint-14

_4149758318.flavorText:
A visitor ignites the sky, and in the truth of light it dreams:
Above the dead and yet-to-die, a legion's blade with fire screams.

_3393519051.flavorText:
A tale that's different from the rest: the thread unfurls against the clocks.
The one the Speaker loved the best must have a perfect paradox.

_3233390913.flavorText:
They sowed the First, now reap the Last; forever narrows to a line
Where Light will fade into the past—when all's converted, nothing shines.

_410996590.flavorText:
An army meets, and stands, and falls. Three nobles wage their hopeless war.
In shifting madness, evil crawls. One stands above the battle's roar.

_1807343361.flavorText: "What am I supposed to put here? 'It's a gun. Kill bad guys with it.'" —Suraya Hawthorne

_1529450902.flavorText: The perpetual eventually gives way to the variable.

_3569802112.flavorText: This is the way things were.

_4106983932.flavorText: The sun shines on both joy and grief.

_3863882743.flavorText: Take weapon in hand and fly to victory.

_2697058914.flavorText: I await the perfect moment and watch my enemies decay.

_1506719573.flavorText: Sweep in like a force of nature. Leave destruction in your wake.

_4166221755.flavorText: "I serve this broken Empire no longer." —Tazaroc

_1289324202.flavorText: There is no minimum safe distance.

_3434944005.flavorText: Gore befalls those who do not respect the hart.

_838556752.flavorText: "If they let you get that close, they deserve it." —The Drifter

_1289997971.flavorText: It has been melted and reforged many times.

_2723241847.flavorText: There is a rough engraving on its side: "In Memoriam."

_3850168899.flavorText: That which returns from the void will always seek revenge.

_1706206669.flavorText: There is a brief moment, before the clash, that lives between fear and certainty. Push through.

_1251729046.flavorText: There is strength in delicate things.

_4103414242.flavorText: Calibrate reality. Seek inevitability. Embody divinity.

_2232171099.flavorText: "Sing them a lullaby of death and nothing more."

_2591746970.flavorText: "Cast a Shadow over the wilds of this universe. Return with glorious trophies." —Emperor Calus

_4068264807.flavorText: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

_847329160.flavorText: Don't let them get a word in.

_3535742959.flavorText: "On me, team; I'm capturing the third point!" —Randy, upon receiving orders not to

_528834068.flavorText: The right weapon can transform you.

_3690523502.flavorText: "To the Hive, they are the same. Show them some love." —Eris Morn

_4277547616.flavorText: "Even my idle thoughts are haunted." —Eris Morn

_3325778512.flavorText: "Thousands of Guardians fell to Crota and the Hive. Thousands." —Eris Morn

_1645386487.flavorText: "They think violence will bring peace. Maybe it can." —Eris Morn

_1016668089.flavorText: "Humanity once dreamt of walking on the Moon. Such innocence." —Eris Morn

_208088207.flavorText: "You walked through my dream, and in your wake, you left only death." —Eris Morn

_2931957300.flavorText: "Broken dreams are all I have left. Why should they be any different?" —Eris Morn

_2723909519.flavorText: "The Hive live by sword logic. Teach them another way." —Eris Morn

_1619016919.flavorText: An ancient instrument of war, battered and worn—but it still fires true. Perhaps it's been waiting for you.

_3369545945.flavorText: the future narrows narrows narrows narrows

_1952163498.flavorText: builds builds builds builds the past

_3454326177.flavorText: "I have seen too much. No one else should bear these burdens." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

_2209003210.flavorText: "Why not use these gifts we've been given?" —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

_3385326721.flavorText: "Knowing how it ends isn't the same as wanting it to be over." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

_4020742303.flavorText: "You know how this will end." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

_4095896073.flavorText: "I should never have let it come to this. Now each arrow is a penance." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

_48643186.flavorText: "These forces have existed forever, but only one of them speaks to us." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

_2408405461.flavorText: "These gifts were not made for us, but we were meant to have them." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

_2138599001.flavorText: If only you could see yourself. But you have no eyes. Not the dimmest sense survives…

_2663204025.flavorText: Stop 'em? Pretty sure our deaths are just meant to be the early warning system.

_2314999489.flavorText: "We must stop the weavers before they seal the Garden and begin to summon back its heart." —Ikora Rey

_1167153950.flavorText: "So... you think you can kill a god?" —Ghost

_4227181568.flavorText: "If you don't got one, it's time to make one." —The Drifter

_2164448701.flavorText: "Survival is our most holy writ. Heterodoxy will be its own undoing." —Kuldax

_2782847179.flavorText: "The logic is ineluctable: Those who die deserve oblivion." —Kuldax

_3067821200.flavorText: "Death is only and forever an ending. All else is sacrilege." —Kuldax

_3110698812.flavorText: We walk where our ancestors once walked.

_3512014804.flavorText: There must be meaning in my roar.

_2816212794.flavorText: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland the Shattered

_136525518.flavorText: Above the cloud with its shadow is the star with its light.

_2326716489.flavorText: "She taught us all to appreciate a good, sturdy axe." —Lord Saladin

_654608616.flavorText: When they have your back to the wall, when all seems lost—steel yourself! Command your future!

_578459533.flavorText: Turn your hunger outward, never inward.

_1584643826.flavorText: "Breathe. Line up the shot. Enjoy the quiet before the kill." —The Drifter

_3861448240.flavorText: "A Reefborn riotgun, rewritten with Hive voices to aid Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

_2338088853.flavorText: "A Reefborn long rifle, rewritten with Hive voices to arm Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

_1496419775.flavorText: "A Reefborn heavy implement, rewritten with Hive voices to make way for Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

_1286686760.flavorText: "A Reefborn autorifle, rewritten with Hive voices to defend Gahlran the failed. Now yours." —Emperor Calus

_569799273.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_569799274.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_569799275.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_4190932264.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_174192097.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_79075821.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_2919334548.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_1642384931.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_2429822976.flavorText: In his strong hand the man held a Rose. And his aura burned bright.

_2429822977.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_4124357815.flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

_930590127.flavorText: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

_2108920981.flavorText: "They were the first to chart the Cosmodrome's mountains." —Lord Saladin

_1115104187.flavorText: Names mean nothing to the dead.

_2199171672.flavorText: Am I the only one who sees?

_3116356268.flavorText: Whether times are lean or fat.

_736901634.flavorText: The age-old chant: The end of days draws nigh.

_821154603.flavorText: Don't let pride keep you from a good meal.

_3354242550.flavorText: My bite will turn your sweet flesh to vile rot.

_2130065553.flavorText: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter

_3973202132.flavorText: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow

_66875353.flavorText: If they're close enough to see it start, then they'd better run.

_4292849692.flavorText: "She only wanted to help. I know that now." —Lord Saladin

_1865351684.flavorText: Forged in honor of Saladin, of all that has been lost and all  that remains.

_4083045006.flavorText: "They say you can't reason with these enemies. I dunno—my gun and I seem to manage just fine." —Kei-Ying

_792755504.flavorText: Three drops is all it takes.

_3993415705.flavorText: "In the heat of battle, Guardian, you will know the right choice to make." —Lord Shaxx

_580961571.flavorText: Hey. You see Cayde around, tell him his gun's ready. —Banshee-44

_324382200.flavorText: "They don't make Dark Age tech like this anymore. Lucky for you I kept all mine." —The Drifter

_2278995296.flavorText: The engineers aren't ready for us.

_1364093401.flavorText: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown

_3211806999.flavorText: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1

_417164956.flavorText: "Untamed. Destructive. As forceful and chaotic as Ymir himself." —Ada-1

_2376481550.flavorText: "Stick to wall, ground, human… then FFFFFRRRRRYYYYY! Hehehehehehehe." —Siviks, Lost to None

_3588934839.flavorText: "Wings flutter. Beauty distracts. Poison injects. The butterfly's curse extends to your enemies. A short life, shortened further by your hand." —Ada-1

_1449922174.flavorText: The fire in your eyes reveals all truths.

_2186258845.flavorText: Fate will hear your war cry.

_2575506895.flavorText: Find the beauty in the flame.

_3325463374.flavorText: They return from fields afar. The eye has passed, the end nears. Do not fade quietly. Let thunder reign again.

_308332265.flavorText: "Silimar's defense broke more assaults than not. His retribution would shake the ground." —Lord Saladin

_1357080535.flavorText: "Once Timur saw you, it was already over, whether they knew it or not." —Lord Saladin

_3169616514.flavorText: "Sometimes Skorri wouldn't show herself until she was the only one left who could stand." —Lord Saladin

_1982711279.flavorText: "She soared above the battle and dove in the blink of an eye. If they were still alive, they were the unlucky ones." —Lord Saladin

_1280933460.flavorText: "Perun's strikes would hit so fast and true that our enemies wouldn't realize their fate until it was too late." —Lord Saladin

_1972985595.flavorText: "With enough altitude, Felwinter's destruction would blanket the field farther than you could see." —Lord Saladin

_2154059444.flavorText: "Yeah… I lost a lot of these out on Nessus. Long story. Lots of dead Vex." —The Drifter

_4117693024.flavorText: "Hiraks always did like to leave an impression." —The Spider

_1071542914.flavorText: "Some things should not be saved." —Techeun Sedia

_233423981.flavorText: Fight. Win. Li- Li- Li- Li- Li- FATAL EXCEPTION HAS OCCURRED AT 0028:C001E36

_3745974521.flavorText: "Earth is our home. Not Mars, not Venus, not even the Reef. We must ensure it is a place we can continue to live for many generations to come." —Devrim Kay

_3776129137.flavorText: You are the true power on the throne.

_1873270090.flavorText: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

_2561659919.flavorText: They look to you to save them.

_64236626.flavorText: This one is a real looker.

_525750263.flavorText: I attack from the shadows. I never miss.

_3419149443.flavorText: I sink my teeth into my prey.

_1518042135.flavorText: In dark water, my fangs are bared.

_1518042134.flavorText: Your name will ring out, your deeds will resound forever.

_2891976013.flavorText: Let them sleep. For a long, long time.

_3383958216.flavorText: SUROS reminds you that a fireteam is better than a soloist.

_3383958217.flavorText: I am ready to defend my territory.

_4157959956.flavorText: Long march. Stone road. Old city. Know the land.

_4157959959.flavorText: Taut sails. Wide rivers. Battered towers. Watch the seas.

_4157959958.flavorText: Old kings. Sharp swords. Epic songs. Take the throne.

_711899772.flavorText: I seek my prey in the shadows.

_711899775.flavorText: SUROS invites you to revel in the conflict.

_1457394908.flavorText: Sun's hanging low in the sky.

_1457394911.flavorText: Place like this ain't home to the faint of heart.

_1457394910.flavorText: Be a pain in their side.

_3906357377.flavorText: You will destroy them one cell at a time.

_3906357378.flavorText: I creep unseen through the darkness.

_3906357379.flavorText: What is the structure of the universe?

_1877183764.flavorText: You stand at the head of the army.

_1877183765.flavorText: Drink deep from the cup of destruction.

_1678957659.flavorText: SUROS invites you to get back on stage.

_1678957658.flavorText: Defeat is inevitable… for someone. Make sure it isn't you.

_1678957657.flavorText: Set your eyes on the sky.

_2591586260.flavorText: SUROS invites you to pick up the pace.

_2591586262.flavorText: Make your enemy's strength your own.

_2591586263.flavorText: Prepare to back up your boasts.

_3441197115.flavorText: Is it possible to measure the infinite?

_3441197112.flavorText: Your first enemy is the darkness in your own heart.

_2351747817.flavorText: SUROS invites you to do it again.

_2351747816.flavorText: What is the shape of reality?

_2351747819.flavorText: Here is a way to free your enemies from their earthly tethers.

_1161276682.flavorText: The second swing is no less deadly.

_4230993599.flavorText:
"Everything I touch falls apart! I see the fragments on the floor!"

"Well, isn't that a good thing? You know, if you're a sword?"

_3222518097.flavorText: A lesson in the art of falling.

_153979399.flavorText: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

_153979396.flavorText: "Guardians never die. But we don't forget those who do." —Lord Shaxx

_3745990145.flavorText: Inhale. Exhale. Flash of light. Endless fallout.

_3040742682.flavorText: Strange things wake at the stroke of twelve.

_4146702548.flavorText: No accounting for where it will fall.

_3413860062.flavorText: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

_3413860063.flavorText: By this right alone do I rule.

_2044500762.flavorText: Despite the Breakers' treachery, Her Majesty still stands.

_1852863732.flavorText: Omolon's newest breakthrough uses focused sonic waves to superheat electrons into a devastating energy beam.

_3766045777.flavorText: "His life brought peace to the Reef. His death brings a sword." —Crows of the Black Hull

_204878059.flavorText: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter

_2069224589.flavorText: I can be anyone you wish, o murderer mine.

_814876685.flavorText: "I couldn't afford to miss. Not when it was his life on the line." —Marin Mansanas, Tangled Outrider

_814876684.flavorText: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

_1541131350.flavorText: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn

_2105827099.flavorText: "Here we can start over." —Mithrax, trans. from Eliksni

_1843044398.flavorText: "Must consider new ways… What cannot change, dies…" —Variks, the Loyal

_1843044399.flavorText: A deal is a deal. Or so you hope.

_1327264046.flavorText: "We are a long way from home." —Arrha (trans. from Eliksni)

_3501969491.flavorText: "How do you think we got here?" —Avrok, trans. from Eliksni

_4138174248.flavorText: Can't let the Shore get you down.

_2112909414.flavorText: Slow to shoot, but brutal upon impact.

_218335759.flavorText: What did you trade away to secure passage to the edge?

_3334276333.flavorText: "The Barons fight together." —Elykris, transl. from Eliksni

_301362380.flavorText: "The Great Machine isn't killing us. We're killing ourselves over the Great Machine." —Brivi, transl. from Eliksni

_301362381.flavorText: The passage to the Shore is not an easy road.

_636912560.flavorText: "No job too tough, if the price is good." —Renegade Corsair Errol Mayz

_3957603605.flavorText: The right thing, for the wrong reasons.

_1178886909.flavorText: Sometimes you forget which side you're on.

_1644160541.flavorText: "It is what she asks of us." —Paladin Kamala Rior

_3740842661.flavorText: "I see our path ahead, full of despair and hardship, and I will walk it with joy in my heart." —Sjur Eido

_346136302.flavorText: "It's what gets left out, what gets reemphasized that you have to pay attention to." —Esila, daughter of Sila

_3297863558.flavorText: Engraved in illuminated letters on the weapon's chassis: THE AWOKEN MADE ME.

_3242168339.flavorText: "We knew it would not be easy." —Paladin Hallam Fen

_334171687.flavorText: "We have a duty to this solar system that goes deeper than blood, deeper than oaths." —Paladin Devi Cassl

_640114618.flavorText: "What else can we do but take up arms?" —Corsair Amrita Vae

_2545083870.flavorText: Is it you or I that tops the food chain, o challenger mine?

_686951703.flavorText: "He didn't recognize me, at the end." —Jolyon Till the Rachis

_3799980700.flavorText: Desire becomes reality, o wishbringer mine.

_568515759.flavorText: We have so much to discuss, o seeker mine.

_654370424.flavorText: I can show you how we were in our prime. You need only ask, o student mine.

_4094657108.flavorText: Sworn into faithful service to the Queen, the Techeuns of the Reef have long protected the secrets of the Awoken.

_601592879.flavorText: Symbiosis. Not predation. Never predation, o wary one mine.

_2721249463.flavorText: It was She that inspired me to imagine your destruction, o jailer mine.

_2653316158.flavorText: "No mercy out here. Can't afford it." —The Drifter

_2034817450.flavorText: "I like to keep my enemies where they can't reach me. I can always find a way to get to them if I have to." —The Drifter

_4077196130.flavorText: "Worlds end. And when yours does, make sure you have a partner you can rely on." —The Drifter

_1789347249.flavorText: "Nothing for it once you place your life upon the die." —The Drifter

_1752585070.flavorText: The leader of the pack endures through the harshest conditions.

_1350102270.flavorText: The chill you feel is death.

_1940885628.flavorText: The shortest distance between two points is a straight line.

_516243773.flavorText: Let the song of the monarch be heard!

_1392429335.flavorText: Let our monarch's spirit ring out and roar!

_4095462486.flavorText: Let everyone fear the gaping maw.

_2928437919.flavorText: The miracle worker for close-range ordnance.

_1406475890.flavorText: The lumbering beast stands ready to fight.

_191996029.flavorText: "On the ladder and in the fight, momentum is the answer."

_2611861926.flavorText: It's going to get worse before it gets better.

_1891561814.flavorText: A Guardian's power makes a rich feeding ground. Do not be revolted. There are parasites that may benefit the host… teeth sharper than your own.

_4036115577.flavorText: Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete. MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

_2856683562.flavorText: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

_1864563948.flavorText: A single strike can alter the course of history.

_2286143274.flavorText: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.

_3413074534.flavorText: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray

_276918162.flavorText: The way of the warrior is death.

_2433826056.flavorText: SUROS invites you pick up the pace.

_1159252500.flavorText: A toast to our love for danger. Fear makes victory ever sweeter.

_1178397318.flavorText: Do not be afraid. Our fate cannot be taken from us. It is a gift.

_1178397319.flavorText: "Do not concern yourself with how many horns I bear." —Lord Shaxx

_159056377.flavorText: Requiem-45: SUROS invites you to honor the dead.

_2084611899.flavorText:
“Vex technology on Mercury. Energy on Mars. This system is rich in spoils if one knows where to look.” 
—Val Ca'uor

_4288031461.flavorText: The son's ambition will be his undoing.

_982229638.flavorText: Rest satisfied with doing well, and leave others to talk of you as they please.

_1942069133.flavorText: The oldest, shortest words—yes and no—are those which require the most thought.

_4272442416.flavorText: "Who will be the first to fall?" —Lakshmi-2

_3826803617.flavorText: "I dream of a world prepared to fight for its existence." —Lakshmi-2

_2817949113.flavorText: "Do not let them distract you from your purpose!" —Lakshmi-2

_1099433612.flavorText: "Do not fear your doubts. Fight your doubts. Honor them as you would honor your enemies." —Lakshmi-2

_1587779165.flavorText: "We are but dust on a stellar wind." —Arach Jalaal

_1523647826.flavorText: "The night sky closes in. We should not be here when the final star fades." —Arach Jalaal

_1813667283.flavorText: "I question the wisdom of our current trajectory." —Arach Jalaal

_1842303080.flavorText: "Do we need another reminder? This world is but a grave." —Arach Jalaal

_2957542878.flavorText: "Do you ever wonder who you were, before?"

_1674742470.flavorText:
"I am the autumnal sun,
With autumn gales my race is run."

_3844694310.flavorText: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

_2208405142.flavorText: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

_3437746471.flavorText: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

_3899270607.flavorText: We outnumber you. We will find you. You are alone, and we are colony.

_19024058.flavorText: "Cryptarchs made a crystal that starts fires? Get me one. I don't care how you do it. Go!" —Cayde-6

_2414612776.flavorText: "That's what I see when I look at the Farm." —Devrim Kay

_2414612777.flavorText: They will tell you that you can't. Don't listen to them.

_2295941920.flavorText: "Making guns helps the hours pass. Especially since Suraya never calls…" —Devrim Kay

_2812672357.flavorText: We are the eulogy of a lost civilization.

_2149166938.flavorText: SUROS invites you to bring back the classics.

_2149166939.flavorText: A noble commander of the battlefield.

_4105447486.flavorText: Night comes for us. We are not ready.

_1490571337.flavorText:
See who's robed as if a god, who stands with pride above the rest!
Destroy this ancient nameless fraud! Destroy the one whose death was blessed!

_3991544422.flavorText:
Amid the endless death one flew—unnatural all-consuming need—
And in the space between the two, accursed comprehension freed.

_3991544423.flavorText:
To Tower comes a war in red; an orphan sounds the empire's call.
Mortal angels mourn the dead while lightless light wraps night in pall.

_472169727.flavorText:
Two siblings cleaved by time and space, reflections never found alone,
The ending of the eldritch race—a path long seen but never known.

_161537636.flavorText:
A charnel but effulgent orb—beacon in a loathsome dark—
Fêted, fetid corpses rise—a too-long-absent gibbous spark.

_3285365667.flavorText:
A spark of knowledge with each fall, the purpose of the endless youth.
No longer shunned, dark's nameless call now brings about tenebrous truth.

_3188460622.flavorText:
A sacred eye that speaks in lies—upending futures in its path.
The way before us to the skies shall see itself in ancient wrath.

_3434629515.flavorText: SUROS invites you to keep it steady.

_228424224.flavorText: SUROS invites you to be spontaneous.

_3216383791.flavorText: "I didn't expect to like it here. But the EDZ is growing on me." —Devrim Kay

_4213221671.flavorText: Do not wait for the sun to rise.

_3920811074.flavorText: SUROS invites you to serve up your greatest hits.

_2516360525.flavorText: "You have not yet found your purpose. But it has found you." —Emissary of the Nine

_2071412133.flavorText: "When the dreams begin, it is already too late." —Emissary of the Nine

_990416096.flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir

_4238497225.flavorText: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

_1457979868.flavorText: "Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane

_2707464805.flavorText: "Earth has no Shadow. Not yet." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

_3886263130.flavorText: "When the end comes, I reserve the right to be last." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal

_3005104939.flavorText: "She loved nothing more than a good blizzard." —Lord Saladin

_622058944.flavorText: "He was more wolf than Human, we used to say." —Lord Saladin

_1369487074.flavorText: "He was the first to forge arms for the Iron Banner." —Lord Saladin

_4024037919.flavorText: Your inciting incident is their tragic ending.

_53159281.flavorText: A City-made sidearm, built for those chosen by the Traveler to become Guardians.

_2936850733.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_1195725817.flavorText: Your wisdom will lead you to victory.

_3556971406.flavorText: SUROS invites you to reflect upon the dead.

_2842493170.flavorText: SUROS invites you to appreciate the classics.

_2842493171.flavorText: A modified weapon from the Last City.

_3627718345.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_3627718344.flavorText: "Even on the darkest days, victory is in sight."  —An optimist (or a liar)

_1595336071.flavorText: SUROS invites you to hold nothing back.

_1502662697.flavorText: Only fools dare enter my kingdom.

_2903592984.flavorText: The one thing they can never take away.

_2903592986.flavorText:
"I am the shadow that whispers in your…"

"Shut up, shadow."

_2936850734.flavorText: Your good heart will lead to great adventures.

_2936850735.flavorText: Will the long night ever end?

_1270948323.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_531591352.flavorText: SUROS invites you to get loud.

_531591353.flavorText: A Guardian is a sunrise over darkness.

_2605790034.flavorText: Wide rivers. Cold winters. Old songs. Find a way.

_2605790033.flavorText: The power you seek is in your hands.

_2605790032.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_1310413524.flavorText: SUROS reminds you that practice makes perfect.

_1310413525.flavorText: Victory is a process, not a finality.

_4138415950.flavorText: You will find your way out of this forest.

_4138415949.flavorText: Wisdom is the greatest power, the dearest treasure.

_4138415948.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_3361694402.flavorText: A prototype from VEIST, the City's newest weapon foundry.

_3361694403.flavorText: Stone walls. Dark storms. Ill omens. Stay awake.

_3361694400.flavorText: Light is the fire that burns away the blight.

_3361694401.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_2037589099.flavorText: A loyal servant, equipped to take care of even the biggest messes.

_2213848861.flavorText: A modded version of the Cadenza-43, a Guardian standby.

_2213848862.flavorText: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

_3185293914.flavorText: A modded version of the SUROS Minuet-42, a Guardian standby.

_3185293912.flavorText: Find the summit and claim it for your own.

_3185293913.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_3246523828.flavorText: You are the wall that defends the people.

_3246523829.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_1393021134.flavorText: In the dark of night we dream of the Light's return.

_1393021135.flavorText: Shed the husk of night and be reborn.

_2694044463.flavorText: A modded version of the Omolon Jiangshi, a Guardian standby.

_2694044462.flavorText: A heavily modded version of a SUROS prototype weapon.

_2694044461.flavorText: A modded version of the Daito Cydonia, a Guardian standby.

_2694044460.flavorText: This weapon was forged by Devrim Kay VIII for the survivors.

_254156943.flavorText: A rusted rifle you found in the EDZ mine. It's old, but it still works.

_3792720684.flavorText: A prototype from VEIST, the City's newest weapon foundry.

_1977926913.flavorText: A sturdy Shotgun forged by capable hands. It packs a punch.

_3550697748.flavorText: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

_3569842567.flavorText: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

_2553946497.flavorText: A standard issue Omolon weapon. City-made.

_2553946496.flavorText: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

_2734369894.flavorText: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

_2209451511.flavorText: Hawthorne forged this weapon out of scraps and salvage during her years alone in the wilds.

_1200414607.flavorText: Once you have one, you'll wonder how you ever did without.

_137879537.flavorText: It's time for the final bow.

_2168486467.flavorText: The bad influence in the family.

_3889907763.flavorText: "New Monarchy believes in giving generously, like rain in spring." —Executor Hideo

_3239754990.flavorText: "Speak briefly and precisely, and what you say will penetrate to the heart." —Executor Hideo

_227548887.flavorText: "Until a ruler arises, we act as simple trustees. Protecting. Receiving. Executing." —Executor Hideo

_1988218406.flavorText: "To persuade others, we must show that we act in their interests." —Executor Hideo

_3435238842.flavorText: "Justice must be true, swift, and utterly impartial." —Executor Hideo

_2693941407.flavorText: "To protect us, as she once protected me." —Executor Hideo

_705774642.flavorText: "We need proper tools if we are to rebuild." —Executor Hideo

_3272713429.flavorText: "To perceive the future from a great distance is both a gift and a promise of triumph." —Lakshmi-2

_4145119417.flavorText: "Perhaps it exists. Perhaps it does not. Either we shall find it, or we shall become it." —Lakshmi-2

_48361213.flavorText: "We will save and protect anyone who joins Dead Orbit. There is a place on our ships for you." —Arach Jalaal

_48361212.flavorText: "Once you see how the balance is tipped against us—once you see doom coming, inexorable and cold—then you must act." —Arach Jalaal

_1277015089.flavorText: "On the day our ships are ready, the City will see us blast into the sky." —Arach Jalaal

_2625782212.flavorText: "Those we've lost still linger in every place we look. Earth is no place for the living." —Arach Jalaal

_1587439031.flavorText: "No need to dig too deep. Our slumber will not be disturbed." —Arach Jalaal

_472847207.flavorText: "We will make a new home out among the stars, and then we will know peace. Until that day..." —Arach Jalaal

_1773600468.flavorText: A chain reaction of nuclear insolence.

_3336215727.flavorText: Remember those who have gone before.

_806021398.flavorText: "The Consensus is bigger than the Speaker. Bigger than any of us. It will survive, because it has to." —Commander Zavala, acting head of the Consensus

_1331482397.flavorText: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

_4124984448.flavorText: Ionized polymer synballistic attack platform. The system's lethality is dynamically robust across tactical spaces.

_3089417789.flavorText: Charge your soul and let the electrons sing.

_3089417788.flavorText: Select application: Flare gun. Water purifier. Interplanetary Positioning System. Encyclopædia Arcana. Personal flotation device. List continues.

_3141979346.flavorText: Thank you for using the Data Analysis, Reconnaissance, and Cooperative Intelligence device. You may call me Darci.

_3141979347.flavorText: Light is a spectrum. Why limit yourself to a single hue?

_2362471601.flavorText: We are small, but we are legion.

_2362471600.flavorText: Since the Collapse, these pistols have been retooled several times to boost their firepower. A worn inscription reads, "To Victor, from Sigrun."

_1744115122.flavorText: "In the Cabal legend, a hero seeks to possess the sun. He succeeds. Then, he becomes Emperor. The Cabal… are not a subtle people." —Tyra Karn

_3580904581.flavorText: Property of Ishtar Collective. WARNING: Gravity propulsor beam can cause serious injury or even death.

_4255268456.flavorText: The inscription, written in a Cabal dialect, reads: "Victory or death!"

_1508896098.flavorText: Ingenuity. Desperation. A haphazard prototype of terrible power. Such were the factors at play in the Wardcliff Incident.

_3628991658.flavorText: Think of space-time as a tapestry on a loom. This weapon is the needle.

_3628991659.flavorText: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

_2907129556.flavorText: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

_3549153978.flavorText: "I call it the Zhang Fei. It hits almost as hard as I do." —Wei Ning

_1345867571.flavorText: The latest Omolon engineering leverages liquid fuel as coolant to keep weapon systems at biting subzero temperatures.

_287042894.flavorText: The promise is in the point of the blade.

_287042893.flavorText: A quantum algorithm, like a sword stroke, must be repeated until the solution is certain.

_2700862856.flavorText: "Hard to make it out, just a blur of bullets and fists."

_3312073052.flavorText: Hold your applause till the end.

_1911843789.flavorText: All I need is a little breathing room.

_1911843790.flavorText: Before you? I just remember searching. What do you remember from before me?

_731147179.flavorText: Defend that which is precious to you.

_1885753222.flavorText: "We have to do more than ask for help, Suraya. We have to give them something to believe in."

_417474226.flavorText: What is the color of the universe?

_1513927138.flavorText: The survivors of that day chose not to remember.

_1513927136.flavorText: It'll be over before you know it.

_1513927137.flavorText: Don't you look at me that way!

_2145476620.flavorText: Sit down. We need to talk.

_2145476622.flavorText: Only you can make it whole again.

_1983332561.flavorText: Let slip the dogs of war.

_2502422773.flavorText: Do not fear. Be what others fear.

_2502422774.flavorText: Listen, and you will hear it.

_3762467077.flavorText: Stand together and play the song that sounds across the stars.

_2535939781.flavorText: Fix your eye upon the rising sun.

_273396910.flavorText: "…and after that, there will be time for questions."

_3909683950.flavorText: Do not enter my realm and expect to leave unscathed.

_1327432221.flavorText: It was a long time coming. But it wasn't the wait. It was the journey.

_2683682446.flavorText: Let the Emperor's gratitude end your foes as swiftly as you have ended his.

_566976654.flavorText: The star in the east, the fire in the dawn.

_566976652.flavorText: SUROS invites you to strike a chord.

_1533499362.flavorText: I will draw them in, then take them out.

_1533499361.flavorText: The reign of Light will be long and peaceful.

_1533499360.flavorText: Make yourself dreadful to your enemies and indispensable to your allies.

_2703340117.flavorText: Heroes are not born, but made.

_925326393.flavorText: Escort your foes to their defeat.

_925326392.flavorText: SUROS invites you to be passionate.

_3748713779.flavorText: Your domain is the battlefield. Its ways are your ways.

_3748713778.flavorText: SUROS invites you to light it up.

_339343290.flavorText: Take arms against the lions of death, the kings of sunset.

_3860697510.flavorText: The City's foes ready themselves for the end.

_3860697508.flavorText: SUROS invites you to join the dance.

_896923850.flavorText: Your piercing Light knows no limits; your searcher's heart, no bounds.

_3778520451.flavorText: SUROS invites you to kick up your heels.

_1825472717.flavorText: "Show them that safe harbor is very far away." —Emissary of the Nine

_1909527966.flavorText: "All this in service of one purpose. You have their attention. Let us see if you can keep it." —Emissary of the Nine

_1018072983.flavorText: At the edge of the universe, I stared into the infinite deep. It stared back, and was pleased. I would become the herald of its victory, and bear witness for all creation.

_3954531357.flavorText: Life offers few greater pleasures than to humiliate the venal aristocracy before a crowd. I am father to the people, and they shall adore me above all others.

_3380742308.flavorText: I am the perfect loving god, and all will tremble to know me.

_3906942101.flavorText: Did Ghaul always dream of a republic? What terrible worm burrowed into his heart that he would betray my love and plot against me?

_3691881271.flavorText: What once was old shall be new again, and history will have its revenge.

_3325744914.flavorText: My first act as emperor was to send the Consul into the wasteland. The golden sun would burn away his corrupt form—a fitting symbol for the revolution that was to be my reign.

_1128225405.flavorText: The conspirators were too afraid to kill me—rightly so. I am the beloved father of the people, and the glorious mob would not suffer my death. My sentence was exile.

_2505533224.flavorText: The Ghost Primus was strong because of his disfigurement, not in spite of it. He alone had the vision to share my dream of a new, perfect world. Ghaul was a creature of singular beauty, and I loved him.

_807192446.flavorText: Forged in honor of Radegast, and righteous rage born anew.
